text:
## How to get Curricula mobile app?

The Curricula mobile app – Curricula LXP is now available, allowing for more
effective corporate learning. Andy is interested in trying out the mobile app
to enhance his learning experience. Let’s see how Andy will get the mobile
app.

1\. If Andy is an iOS user, he can search for "Curricula LXP" in Apple App
Store or scan the QR code below.

2\. If Andy is an Android user, he can search for "Curricula LXP" in Google
Play Store or scan the QR code below.
